Some affected individuals have no symptoms, and the condition is discovered through routine blood tests.",GHR,8p11 myeloproliferative syndrome
How many people are affected by 8p11 myeloproliferative syndrome ?,The prevalence of 8p11 myeloproliferative syndrome is unknown. It is thought to be a rare condition.,GHR,
